Class AdminControl

java.lang.Object
Controller.Control
Controller.AdminControl
public class AdminControl
extends Control
Controller class for admin access functional logic.

    • addCourse

      public static void addCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String school, java.lang.String indexNo, java.lang.String groupNo, java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String lessonType, java.lang.String day, java.lang.String oddEven, java.lang.String vacancy, java.lang.String size, java.lang.String acadUnits) throws java.io.IOException
      Logic method for adding a new course.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code to add.
      school - School to add.
      indexNo - Index number to add.
      groupNo - Group number to add.
      startTime - Start time to add.
      endTime - End time to add.
      location - Location to add.
      lessonType - Lesson type to add.
      day - Lesson day to add.
      oddEven - The weeks which lessons happen to add.
      vacancy - Vacancy of course to add.
      size - Size of course to add.
      acadUnits - Academic unit of course to add.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
